questions.title: Is the check in PCDA in QMS done correctly and exists?
questions.description: The process of the data, results, and information gathered from the previous step as they are evaluated

queries.name: Requirement PCDA Gaps
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement" or "Policy" or "Procedure") AND (state=("GAP_DETECTED"))

queries.name: Requirement PCDA Warning
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement" or "Policy" or "Procedure") AND (state=("WARNING"))

queries.name: Requirement PCDA Unknown
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement" or "Policy" or "Procedure") AND (state=("UNKNOWN"))

questions.title: What is the status on the act or adjust in PCDA in QMS?
questions.description: A combination of the "do" and "check" stages that help determine issues and vulnerabilities with the procedure

queries.name: Requirement PCDA Gaps
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement" or "Policy" or "Procedure") AND (state=("GAP_DETECTED"))

queries.name: Requirement PCDA Warning
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement" or "Policy" or "Procedure") AND (state=("WARNING"))

queries.name: Requirement PCDA Unknown
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement" or "Policy" or "Procedure") AND (state=("UNKNOWN"))

questions.title: What recovery activities will continue after your organization  transitions from short-term to long-term recovery?

queries.name: What findings and metrics are being monitored for security relevance?
queries.query: find (Finding|Monitor)

questions.title: How will your organization restore customer and public user confidence following this type of incident?

queries.name: What are the policies and procedures for customer responsibilities in case of breach?
queries.query: find (Policy|Procedure) with title~='Customer Responsibilities in a Possible Breach'

questions.title: What is my new favorite color?
questions.description: Monty Python still wants to know.

queries.name: favorite-color
queries.query: Find * with tag.colored=true AND tag.favorite=true

queries.name: not-favorite-color
queries.query: Find * with tag.colored!=true OR tag.favorite!=true

questions.title: List all jenkins users

queries.query: find jenkins_user
FIND User WITH _type='jenkins_user'
find * with _type='jenkins_user'

questions.title: Does your organization have forensic services available?     What SOPs, if any, do you have in place?       How would available services be initiated?

queries.name: Which resources do not have diagnostic settings?
queries.query: Find (   azure_api_management_service|   azure_batch_account|   azure_cdn_endpoint|   azure_cdn_profile|   azure_container_registry|   azure_event_grid_domain|   azure_event_grid_topic|   azure_keyvault_service|   azure_lb|   azure_mariadb_server|   azure_mysql_server|   azure_network_azure_firewall|   azure_postgresql_server|   azure_public_ip|   azure_security_group|   azure_sql_server|   azure_subscription|   azure_vnet ) that has azure_diagnostic_setting

questions.title: At what point would you consider your organization back to steady state operations?

queries.name: What are the policies and procedures for incident response?
queries.query: find Procedure    that IMPLEMENTS Policy with    title~='Incident Response'

questions.title: List jenkins account and associated jenkins users

queries.query: find jenkins_account as account that has jenkins_user as user return account, user
find Account as account that has jenkins_user as user return account, user

questions.title: What customers and partners and local, state, or federal resources     are available to assist in recovery or business continuity?      Does your organization have memorandums of understanding with  response entities?

queries.name: Do I have proper vendor support for my software applications?
queries.query: Find Application as app   that CONNECTS Account that (HAS|HOSTS|MANAGES) Vendor as v return   app.displayName as app,   v.name as vendor, v.linkToSLA, v.linkToMSA

queries.name: Do I have proper vendor support for my software applications?
queries.query: Find Application as app   that (HAS|HOSTS|MANAGES) Vendor as v return   app.displayName as app,   v.name as vendor, v.linkToSLA, v.linkToMSA

queries.name: Do I have proper vendor support for my software applications?
queries.query: Find Application   that !(HAS|HOSTS|MANAGES) (Account|Vendor|CodeRepo|Project)

questions.title: Following this attack, what additional protective measures will be     put in place at your organization or in your system?     How would information on protective measures be obtained?      How would any relevant sensitive information be shared?        How do you communicate information to customers and partners      or receive information from them?          ii. Do you know how to contact your local / state law      enforcement agencies?          iii. Do you have a Homeland Security Information Network (HSIN)       account?     Do you know how to contact your CISA Protective Security Advisor  (PSA)?

queries.name: Are there documented learnings (i.e. postmortem activities) from incidents or outages?
queries.query: Find 'post mortem' with _class=('Review' or 'Record' or 'Document') and    (_createdOn > date.now-1yr or _beginOn > date.now-1yr)

queries.name: Are there documented learnings (i.e. postmortem activities) from incidents or outages?
queries.query: Find 'postmortem' with _class=('Review' or 'Record' or 'Document') and (_createdOn > date.now-1yr or _beginOn > date.now-1yr)

questions.title: Is Assignment of Roles, development, and management team updated or reviewed every 90 days?
questions.description: Ensures Assignment of Roles, development, and management team is updated or reviewed every 90 days

queries.name: Updated/Reviewed within 90 days
queries.query: FIND "Assignment of Roles, development, and management team" WITH _class="Procedure" AND ((reviewedOn > date.now - 90 day) OR (updatedOn > date.now - 90 day)) as u RETURN u.displayName as title, u.reviewedOn as reviewedOn, u.updatedOn as updatedOn

queries.name: Updated/Reviewed after 90 days
queries.query: FIND "Assignment of Roles, development, and management team" WITH _class="Procedure" AND ((reviewedOn < date.now - 90 day) OR (updatedOn < date.now - 90 day)) as u RETURN u.displayName as title, u.reviewedOn as reviewedOn, u.updatedOn as updatedOn

questions.title: What protocols exist for alerting employees to an incident?  What notification methods does your team use to send alert information?

queries.name: Is there a communication template for external notification in case of a breach?
queries.query: find Procedure with   title~='Sample Notification Letter'

questions.title: Does your organization set up a unified command and communication  UCC team at this time?     When would you expect unified command to begin coming together?   Are key customers, agencies and company personnel familiar with UCC procedures?       What are each organization's priorities at this stage of the incident?  Which customers / agencies are involved in the response?  Which customer or agency would have the lead in the response?  How would law enforcement respond to the reports of an attack?    How would the response change given the information about the data impacted?

queries.name: Is there a communication template for external notification in case of a breach?
queries.query: find Procedure with title~='Sample Notification Letter'

questions.title: What is the feedback and recommendations from clients, customers, third party, and employees?

questions.title: What are your remediation procedures for an incident of this type?     Are there established plans for a complete restore of both the cloud infrastructure as well as the customer data on all clouds and document stores, if necessary?          Who is responsible for activating the restore procedures?       What training has been done on these plans?          Is there a specified point of contact?          Would calendar or holidays or times of day impact this process?           Are there secondary and tertiary contact points in case the primary point of contact is a part of the incident or are overwhelmed?  What plans or procedures exist to work with individuals with access and functional needs?

queries.name: What are the policies and procedures related to incident response tabletops?
queries.query: find Procedure with   title~='Tabletop'   that IMPLEMENTS Policy with   title~='Incident Response'

questions.title: Who is responsible for communicating incident information to the affected users? Does your organization have a designated Chief Privacy Officer (CPO)? If so:  What protocols exist for alerting partner organizations to an incident?  Who is responsible for sending out the alerts or warnings?     Do protocols exist for addressing media inquiries?     How do CPOs receive information from the incident?    Do you have canned public information templates for use in different kinds of incidents?      Do you send out any notifications to the public using social media? If so, at what point in the incident would you expect to start sending out the notifications?  Have your CPOs previously collaborated with other supporting organizations' CPOs during a crisis?

NIST SR-12: Component disposal 
System components are to be disposed at any time of during the system development life cycle.

queries.query: find jenkins_job with buildDiscarder=false

questions.title: Is the plan in PCDA in QMS done correctly and each step exists?

queries.name: Policies and Procedures documented
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Policy" or "Procedure")

queries.name: Requirements/controls
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement")

queries.name: Requirement/Policy/Procedure PCDA Gaps
queries.query: FIND * WITH (displayName~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") OR description~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or name~=("evelopment" OR "bjective") or title~=("evelopment" OR "bjective")) AND _class=("Requirement" or "Policy" or "Procedure") THAT HAS jupiterone_compliance_gap

queries.query: find Vendor as v return   v.name, v.active, v.validated, v.webLink, v.linkToDPA, v.linkToISA,    v.linkToMSA, v.linkToSLA, v.privacyPolicy, v.termsConditions, v.statusPage
